p: DMAC (4-dimethylamincinnamaldehyde), L-DOPA (3,4-dihydroxy-L-phenylalanine), kojic acid, formic acid (FA), K 3PO 4, TROLOX (6-hydroxy-2,5,7,8-tetramethylchroman-2-carboxylic acid), DPPH (2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl), tyrosinase (E.C. 1.14.18.1) from mushroom, ammonium formate were purchased from Sigma Aldrich (Darmstadt, Germany). NaH 2PO 4 was purchased from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany) and Na 2HPO 4 from UCB (Bruxelles, Belgium). All HPLC grade and technical solvents as well as absolute ethanol used in this work were purchased from VWR (Leuven, Belgium).
